ygData.subject: RE: Got my Waki! (EBW quest semi-spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh!  WTG on the EBW!!  Coolness! I was cruising thru Runnyeye and went down to see if I could nab a BIBS (sword) and ran into a 50 druid who was camping for a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh! WTG on the EBW!! Coolness!

I was cruising thru Runnyeye and went down to see if I could nab a BIBS
(sword) and ran into a 50 druid who was camping for a BIC (crown). We
chatted and I offered my BIC as trade bait but we could not agree - so in
the end I just gave him the BIC and said "you can owe me one..." Hehe,
well, he decided he did not wanna be in debt so he gave me a butler tooth!

Asking around in my guild I found that a druid had 2 maid's teeth and a
warrior had a butler tooth. So, I traded my butler for a maid and gave the
maid to the warrior. Hehe, so now they each got the stuff to make EBW's.
Too bad they are no drops that don't proc.

Sylly

p.s. everyone in our guild is now 2YK compliant <eg> including yours truly!



-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 11, 2000 6:27 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Got my Waki! (EBW quest
semi-spoiler)

From: <kim@...>

Our first guild night in Mistmoore, we killed the butler and
got a fang.

[snipage]

So basically, I got both fangs off the first butler and maid
I
ever killed. :-P I had to wait longer for the avenging
caitiff to show up (6 hours) than I did for the butler or
the
maid. :) I couldn't figure out how to get him to give me
the
quest info, so I took a chance and just gave him both fangs.

Presto - electrum bladed wakizashi (7 dam 21 delay 2 wt).

I think I will dual wield it with my sceptre of rahotep when
I
feel like showing off rare weapons (yeah, I ran across him
too). :)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
